tool_description: API to validate email and normalize email
name: Email Utilities
title: Email Utilities

api_list.name: /normalize
api_list.description: get normalized form of an email

api_list.name: /verify
api_list.description: get normalized form of an email

optional_parameters.name: checkSMTP
optional_parameters.description: Is SMTP check required on port 25

disposable.description: is this a DEA (disposable email address)

free.description: is domain a free email domain

has_mx_records.description: whether or not MX-Records for the domain

reachable.description: an enumeration to describe whether the recipient address is real

catch_all.description: does the domain have a catch-all email address?

deliverable.description: can send an email to the email server?

disabled.description: is the email blocked or disabled by the provider?

full_inbox.description: is the email account's inbox full?
